changelog.title: USB Content Import
changelog.description: Added 6 new learning resources from external content library - quizzes, modules, and labs.

changelog.title: Key House Crypto Labs
changelog.description: New comprehensive hashing and steganography lab with interactive SHA-256, LSB encoding, and zero-width text hiding.

changelog.title: Web House Expansion
changelog.description: Added IP addressing module, 85-card networking flashcards, and 30-question ports & protocols quiz.
